The Good Eggs display virtues within 
their community, but what are virtues? Virtues are 
positive traits, such as understanding, forgiveness, 
gratitude, generosity, cooperation, love, acceptance, 
respect, responsibility, honesty, confidence, and manners. 


They also learn about diversity as they travel to 
10 countries, and come back to their hometown to learn 
the importance of community service! The Good Eggs help 
each other and make a positive difference in their lives 
and the lives of others.
